articles.title: BTS win big at Asias biggest music awards in Hong Kong - Geo News
articles.description: BTS were the big winners at the Mnet Asian Music Awards on Saturday, picking up a total nine awards
articles.content:
Smash hit septet BTS were the big winners at the Mnet Asian Music Awards in Hong Kong on Saturday, picking up a total nine awards including Worldwide Icon of the Year, reported Variety.

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness. 

The recall for Cantorel’s Plateau 5 Fromages was first issued by a European Commissio…

articles.content:
LONDON (BLOOMBERG) - The world's poultry farmers are battling another grim spell of bird-flu cases, risking higher chicken prices and fewer free-range eggs.
